properties.name: component
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the UI component item responds to user interaction.

properties.name: html
properties.description: Specifies the HTML markup to be inserted into the item element.

properties.name: render
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: template
properties.description: Specifies a template that should be used to render this item only.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Specifies text displayed for the UI component item.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Specifies whether or not a UI component item must be displayed.
